original_text: If you make plenty of fruit, that will give honour to my Father. You will show that you are truly my disciples.
korean_text: 너희가 열매를 많이 맺으면 내 아버지께서 영광을 받으실 것이요 너희는 내 제자가 되리라

sentences.original_text: If you make plenty of fruit
that will give honour to my Father
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내 아버지께 영광을 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will show that you are truly my disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 참으로 내 제자임을 보여줄 것이다
